metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17069 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: PuTTY before 0.73 might allow remote SSH-1 servers to cause a denial of service by accessing freed memory locations via an SSH1_MSG_DISCONNECT message.

criterions.comment: putty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
